name: To wander the farlands
description:
This is a one page TTRPG by fae.exe and Alder Blackthorn, based on Tales of the Loathsome Wanderer, by the latter. 

This is a game about being a bad person with a gun. This is a game about wandering a strange place, trying to accomplish your fate, and maybe getting murdered by a witch. Lightly PbtA, also inspired by John Harper and Grant Howitt. 

If you do play it, we appreciate any feedback. This hasn't been playtested and might actually be a fever dream. If you enjoy it, please leave a comment to water our crops.
